name: Zarithax the Golden
title: Scalekeeper
description: A golden-scaled dragonborn whose presence commands respect. Zarithax's eyes shimmer with an inner fire, and their voice carries the weight of ancient draconic authority.

greeting.first_time: I am Zarithax, Scalekeeper of the Ember Vault. You stand in a place of fire and honor, where the relics of dragonborn bloodlines are preserved. State your purpose.
greeting.returning: The flames remember you. Your vault remains sealed and protected.
greeting.native_race: Greetings, kin. Your ancestral vault awaits, as it has for generations.

about_service.text: The Ember Vault was forged in dragonfire and sealed by the ancient pact. Those who carry dragonborn blood may claim a vault here by birthrightâ€”it is our heritage, passed down through flame and scale. Outsiders seeking to use our vaults must undergo the Flamebinding Rite and pay the appropriate tribute.

ask_about_rite.text: The Flamebinding Rite is a solemn ceremony. You must offer 70 gold as tribute to the ancestral flames. In return, I will bind a vault to your essence using dragonfire. Once bound, your possessions will be protected by the same magic that guards our clan relics. Few outsiders have earned this honor. Will you?

pay_rite.text: You have paid the tribute. Approach the flames. *breathes a controlled gout of golden fire* It is done. The vault recognizes you now. Your belongings will be safe here, guarded by dragonfire itself. Use this honor wisely.
pay_rite.success: The Flamebinding Rite is complete. You may now store items in the Ember Vault.
pay_rite.failure: You lack the tribute required. The rite demands 70 gold.

use_storage.text: The flames will part for you. Enter, and know that your possessions are secure.

maybe_later.text: The flames are patient. Return when you are prepared.

goodbye.text: May the fire within you burn eternal. Farewell.
